# MindNation – Holistic well‑being for teams

> MindNation is a mental healthcare system for teams and organizations operating in Asia, the Middle East and Latin America:contentReference[oaicite:0]{index=0}. Its mission is “to eliminate the barriers of seeking help by providing total mental healthcare support to employees”:contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1}. Founded in 2019 and based in Manila, Philippines, MindNation offers teletherapy consultations with psychologists and WellBeing Coaches as well as workshops, talks and data‑driven tools to improve organizational mental well‑being:contentReference[oaicite:2]{index=2}. The platform has reached more than 120,000 individuals and partnered with over 150 organizations across the US, Latin America and Asia:contentReference[oaicite:3]{index=3}:contentReference[oaicite:4]{index=4}.  
>
> MindNation’s services are delivered through an expert‑backed CareNow plan that provides holistic well‑being support:contentReference[oaicite:5]{index=5}. Users can book 24/7/365 virtual sessions with licensed well‑being experts:contentReference[oaicite:6]{index=6}:contentReference[oaicite:7]{index=7}, take science‑backed quizzes to assess their well‑being, productivity or stress levels:contentReference[oaicite:8]{index=8}, and access self‑paced exercises and MindED courses:contentReference[oaicite:10]{index=10}. The MindNation app helps users make mental health care an everyday habit and offers features such as matching with experts, 24/7 chat, self‑guided tools and a BestMe dashboard that tracks goals and challenges:contentReference[oaicite:11]{index=11}:contentReference[oaicite:12]{index=12}. According to MindNation, 97 % of users feel better after one session and 95 % book sessions again:contentReference[oaicite:13]{index=13}; the app’s virtual sessions have a 4.8/5 user rating and 94 % of respondents report feeling better after a virtual session:contentReference[oaicite:14]{index=14}.
>
> MindNation also offers talks and workshops to promote well‑being and productivity:contentReference[oaicite:15]{index=15}, stress‑management programmes that pair individuals with experts:contentReference[oaicite:16]{index=16}, and customized ROI reports that quantify the cost of mental health challenges and the impact of interventions:contentReference[oaicite:17]{index=17}. The MindED resource hub provides MindDrills, MindWrites, MindBites, toolkits and podcasts, allowing individuals to build habits and learn about topics such as productivity, meditation, mindfulness, self‑esteem, sleep and stress management.

## About
- [Our mission & story](https://mindnation.com/about-us-v2): MindNation’s mission is to eliminate barriers to seeking help by providing total mental healthcare support to employees; the page explains the founders’ personal experiences and why they created MindNation:contentReference[oaicite:19]{index=19}.
- [About us](https://mindnation.com/about-us): Overview of MindNation’s impact, including that it has touched 120,000+ lives and supported over 150 organisations across the US, Latin America and Asia; describes services such as talks, training, workshops and 24/7 teletherapy sessions:contentReference[oaicite:20]{index=20}.

## Services
- [How it works](https://mindnation.com/how-it-works): Introduces the CareNow plan and explains that MindNation matches users with licensed experts, offers secure sessions, provides self‑guided tools and training, and includes a WellBeing Survey and admin dashboard for managers:contentReference[oaicite:21]{index=21}.
- [MindNation app](https://mindnation.com/app): Describes the app and its benefits, including 24/7/365 virtual sessions with experts, a 4.8/5 user rating, 94 % of respondents feeling better after a virtual session, science‑backed quizzes and features such as Care (matched sessions), Connect (24/7 chat), Grow (self‑guided tools) and Learn (quizzes):contentReference[oaicite:22]{index=22}.
- [MindED](https://mindnation.com/minded): Resource hub offering MindDrills, MindWrites, MindBites, toolkits and podcasts; contains exercises and articles on productivity, meditation, mindfulness, self‑esteem, sleep and stress management.
- [Quizzes](https://mindnation.com/wellbeing-quiz) – WellBeing Quiz; [Productivity Quiz](https://mindnation.com/productivity-quiz); [Stress Test](https://mindnation.com/stress-test): Science‑backed quizzes that help users assess their well‑being, productivity or stress levels:contentReference[oaicite:24]{index=24}.
- [Shop](https://shop.mindnation.com): E‑commerce site offering products that support well‑being (note: not covered in this llms.txt; included for completeness).
- [Talks & workshops](https://mindnation.com/about-us#talks): List of talk topics and training programmes aimed at promoting well‑being and productivity:contentReference[oaicite:25]{index=25}.

## Optional
- [CB Insights profile](https://www.cbinsights.com/company/mindnation): Provides external context about MindNation, noting that the company was founded in 2019, is based in Manila, Philippines and operates in Asia, the Middle East and Latin America; the profile summarizes services including teletherapy consultations, WellBeing Coach sessions and workshops:contentReference[oaicite:26]{index=26}.
- [Marketing‑Interactive article](https://www.marketing-interactive.com/rewriting-the-scroll-mindnation-dentsu-rethink-social-media-for-wellbeing): Describes MindNation’s 2025 “Learn to pause” campaign with Dentsu, which transforms social media into a mental wellness tool and highlights MindNation’s round‑the‑clock access to licensed mental health professionals and self‑paced tools:contentReference[oaicite:27]{index=27}.
